title: Job Title: Computer Software Support Specialist
description:
Job Title: Computer Software Support Specialist

Company: Two Point Conversions, Inc.

Location: Fully Remote

www.twopoint.com

About Us:

Two Point Conversions, Inc. is the industry leader in pharmacy data conversion, migration, archiving, and warehousing. We help healthcare organizations transition critical pharmacy data with precision, security, and reliability.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a talented Computer Software Support Specialist to join our growing remote team. This individual will play a key role in installing, supporting, and maintaining our pharmacy archive applications in both our hosted cloud environment and clients’ local networks.

This team member will be responsible for installing pharmacy archive applications, monitoring automated tasks, and performing various duties to assist the engineering and operations staff. 

Responsibilities:

  • Install and configure pharmacy archive and data conversion applications in cloud and client environments.
  • Monitor automated tasks and processes to ensure successful completion.
  • Set up data conversion environments on in-network client servers.
  • Perform data conversions for pharmacy images between various legacy software systems.
  • Perform advanced database queries to support data analysis and validation.
  • Upgrade and maintain data maps and schemas to ensure accurate database loading.
  • Provide customer support by receiving, reproducing, and resolving defect reports.
  • Apply documented fixes and escalate complex issues as needed.
  • Code, test and troubleshoot programs utilizing the appropriate hardware, database, and programming technology. 
  • Analyze performance of programs and take action to correct deficiencies.
  • Sustain confidentiality with regard to information being processed, stored or accessed.
  • Collaborate with engineering staff to support ongoing projects and resolve technical issues.
  • Develop and maintain automation scripts to streamline operational processes.

 

Qualifications:

 

  • Bachelor’s in Computer Science or equivalent is required.
  • Proficiency in working across multiple operating systems, including Windows, Linux, and Unix.
  • Advanced experience with relational database management systems, preferably Microsoft SQL Server, ORACLE, or MySQL. 
  • Coding and scripting experience in PERL, bash and/or batch, or similar language(s). 
  • Strong aptitude for implementing, testing, and troubleshooting programming changes and system modifications.
  • Excellent analytical skills with the ability to research issues, interpret data, and draw sound conclusions.
  • Demonstrated capacity to quickly learn, adapt to, and support new systems and applications.
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks effectively.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Demonstrated ability to provide professional, customer-focused support in a positive manner.
  • Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and efficiently in a remote environment.
